phrs.translation: 生理性缩复环, 生理缩复环, 理缩复环
病理缩复环, 病理性缩复环
撤稿观察, 撤稿监察, 撤稿瞭望, 撤稿观察网
眼睑退缩, 眼睑畏缩

sentences.sentence: He demanded a full retraction of the allegations against him.
sentences.translation: 他要求完全收回针对他的言论。

sentences.sentence: Miss Pearce said she expected an unqualified retraction of his comments within twenty-four hours.
sentences.translation: 皮尔斯小姐称她希望他在24小时内无条件收回他的言论。

sentences.sentence: I think the paper should publish a retraction, or at the very least an apology to Sally.
sentences.translation: 我认为报纸应该发表一篇撤回的文章，或者至少向萨利道歉。
